sentences.sCn: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

sentences.sContent: ...are now offering to convert your magstripe card to a chip-and-PIN model...
...75 billion that Capgemini consultants estimate it will take to convert all their registers to be chip-and-PIN-compatible...

synos.tran: 转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰
皈依者；改变宗教信仰者

words.tran: 可改变的；同意义的；可交换的
转换；变换；[金融] 兑换；改变信仰
[电] 变流器，整流器；转化器
可变换，可兑换；可改变性
转变；改变信仰（convert的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 转变， 转化； 改变
trans.tranOther: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way
